name: Mastering design systems components
description:
Hacks and tricks for improving components for UI kit of your design system.


This is an extended and annotated version of what was presented on Into Figma Design Systems conference in June 2021 by Jan Toman from Productboard. Check slides for full context.


Content:

  • Zero-size frames
  • Flexible bars & sliders
  • Communicating breaking changes


Each page contains detailed annotated examples of components and their instances with various content applied.
